description: A podcast host asks PodMatch AI to find a motivational speaker for a personal development episode. The AI fetches past episode topics, analyzes audience interests, searches expert profiles, ranks candidates, and generates a personalized outreach email.

Subject: Invitation to Join "Growth Mindset" – Episode on Resilience & Leadership

Hi Dr. Patel,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the *Growth Mindset* podcast where we explore science‑backed strategies for personal development. Our listeners are especially interested in productivity, resilience, and leadership—topics that align perfectly with your research on positive psychology and motivation.

We’re planning an upcoming episode titled **"Cultivating Resilience and Leadership in Everyday Life"** and would be honored to have you share your expertise on how individuals can build lasting resilience and lead more effectively.

Would you be available for a 45‑minute interview sometime in the next two weeks? We can record remotely at a time that works best for you.

Thank you for considering this invitation. I look forward to the possibility of featuring your insights on the show.

Warm regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Growth Mindset Podcast
alex.rivera@growthmindset.com
[Podcast Link]
